paragraph.value: In Table 2, we compare the development set results of the state of the art methods with the BERT model trained on different retrieved evidence sets. Training based on the BERT sentence retrieval predictions significantly enhances the verification results because while it explicitly improves the FEVER score by providing more correct evidence sentences, it provides a better training set for the verification system.
